name: ASP.NET Web Handler File
summary: An AXD file is a file used by ASP.NET applications for handling embedded resource requests. It contains instructions for retrieving embedded resources, such as images, JavaScript ( .JS ) files, and .CSS files. AXD files are used for injecting resources into the client-side webpage and access them on the server in a standard way.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
